From 19 July till 1 August 2025, [we](https://www.bds3.org/our-team) organized the third edition of the [Ukrainian Biological Data Science Summer School](https://www.bds3.org). (See also the links to my posts on the [first](2023-07-ubds3.html) and [second](2024-07-ubds3.html) and  editions).
